name: Ballard Community Fridge
description: Free community fridge accessible 24/7. Take what you need, leave what you can.

name: Capitol Hill Community Fridge
description: Community-maintained fridge with fresh and prepared foods. Open 24/7 for all.

name: Georgetown Community Fridge
description: Free community fridge in Georgetown. Take what you need, share what you can.

name: University District Community Fridge
description: Community fridge serving the U-District. Accessible 24/7 for all community members.

name: Northwest Harvest - Sodo
description: Washington's leading hunger relief agency. Provides groceries and fresh produce to families in need.

name: FamilyWorks Food Bank
description: Provides emergency food, clothing, and support services. Serving Wallingford and surrounding neighborhoods.

name: West Seattle Food Bank
description: Community-based food bank serving West Seattle families. No ID or income verification required.

name: University District Food Bank
description: Emergency food assistance for students and community members. Fresh produce and culturally diverse foods.

name: Pike Place Market Blessing Box
description: Community food box with non-perishable items. Located near Pike Place Market.

name: Greenwood Blessing Box
description: Free community food box. Take what you need, give what you can.
